title: Neoplastic Astrocytes
brief_description: Shows the characteristic features of astrocytes in astrocytomas, glioblastomas and astroblastomas. Coloured Bodian preparations are shown for comparison with the living cells. The form density and activity of neoplastic astrocytes and component elements are revealed. The film concludes with two typical astrocytes.
